name: fuzzy-sku-e2e-tests
description: E2E tests for Fuzzy SKU POC using Playwright

scripts.test:reset: rm -f .test-results-shared.json fuzzy-sku-test-results.csv && rm -rf test-screenshots-steps/* custom-report-dist/screenshots/* && echo 'âœ… Test results and screenshots reset! Ready for fresh run.'
scripts.test:fresh: pnpm run test:reset && playwright test fuzzy-sku-search.spec.ts
scripts.test:clean: rm -rf test-screenshots-steps custom-report-dist playwright-report test-results .test-results-shared.json fuzzy-sku-test-results.csv && echo 'ðŸ§¹ All test artifacts cleaned!'
